```{r}
library(haven)
library(survey)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data <- read_sav("/Users/zhan039/Desktop/USC_HEAL/CHC_DHS/YZ/DHS_YZ.sav")
```

```{r}
DHS <- data %>% filter(., !DHSSite %in% "")
```

```{r}
DHS.new <- DHS %>% mutate(., prop = Total/sum(Total))

DHS.new <- rename(DHS.new, weight = prop)

colnames(DHS.new)[startsWith(colnames(DHS.new), "@")] <- gsub("@", "group", colnames(DHS.new)[startsWith(colnames(DHS.new), "@")])

DHS.new

```

```{r}
write_sav(DHS.new, "/Users/zhan039/Desktop/USC_HEAL/CHC_DHS/YZ/DHS_weight_YZ.sav")
```
